typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=Manrope:wght@400;600;700;800&display=swap');

usage_rules: Use 'bg-background' for the main app background (Deep Slate).
Use 'bg-card' for containers/cards to create depth.
Use 'text-primary' for key stats (e.g., smoke-free days).
Use 'bg-destructive' ONLY for the 'I want to smoke' panic button or critical errors.

container_rules: Mobile-first: 'w-full max-w-md mx-auto' for the main app container to simulate a mobile view on desktop.
Padding: Always add 'px-4 py-6' or 'p-6' to containers.
Bottom Nav: Fixed at bottom, 'h-16', with 'backdrop-blur-xl' and 'border-t border-border/50'.

cards.style: rounded-2xl border border-border/50 bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-sm shadow-sm

inputs.style: rounded-xl bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 transition-all

backgrounds.description: Calming night sky/nature for subtle background overlays (use with low opacity)

micro_interactions: Active scale: active:scale-95 for all clickable elements
Fade in: animate-in fade-in duration-500 slide-in-from-bottom-4

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-muted-foreground has at least 4.5:1 contrast against background.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the colors defined in this JSON.
2. Update index.css with the CSS variables for the dark theme.
4. Create the layout wrapper that handles the mobile-view constraint (max-w-md mx-auto).
6. Build the 'Today' screen with the Panic Button and Timer.
8. Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
